{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Mi4.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = Mi4 Cable IP Client Set-Top Box |caption2 = ATSC, HEVC, UHD with MoCA 2.0 and TiVo |pp = https://www.arris.com/products/mi4-cable-ip-client/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Arris_Mi4 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Arris |model = Mi4 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = (IP900) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = set top box |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = ACQ-IP900 |icid = 109AS-IP900 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM7438;BROADCOM, BCM7438SMV, KFSBB3G; |cpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLM8G1GEME-B041; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4A8G165WB-BCRC; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI, SPDIF out, MoCA 2.0, Bluetooth 4.1 LE, ZigBee, |addchip = Bluetooth Chip;Broadcom;BCM20704;20704UA2, KFFB1G, (U9804);1; ,,, ZigBee RF4CE Remote Control Chip;GreenPeak (Qorvo);GP501C32GP;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Foxconn |manuf_model = U42Z053 |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 07/24/2017 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== It has full 4K60p output and supports HDR10 programming. Also known as ''[[Arris IP900]]'' ([[TiVO TCDA95000]]) {{FCC ST|01/25/2018|indexme.}}
===Specifications=== *[https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/arris-introduces-advanced-set-top-portfolio-providing-tivo-experience-supports-the-nctc-vu-it-program-300492661.html ''ARRIS Introduces Advanced TiVo Set-Top'' on '''PR|NewsWire'''] *[http://www.goamt.com/mi4-cable-ip-client-atsc-hevc-uhd-moca-2.0-tivo ''Arris Mi4'' on '''Advanced Media Technologies'''] • [http://www.goamt.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/MI4_CABLE-IP-CLIENT-ATSC-HEVC-UHD-WITH-MOCA-2.0-TIVO_AMT.pdf Datasheet] :HDMI, SPDIF, ATSC, HEVC, HDR10, UHD, MoCA 2.0, TiVo
==See also== :;[http://www.goamt.com/mfrcatalog/arris-headend-digital-video-processing Arris DVP Products (AMT)] *[[Arris MG1]] (MoCA 2.0) • [http://www.goamt.com/mg1-whole-home-multi-tuner-video-gateway AMT] • [http://www.goamt.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/MG1_MULTI-TUNER-VIDEO-GATEWAY_AMT.pdf Spec.] *[[Arris MG2]] (DCX900) • [http://www.goamt.com/mg2-cable-media-gateway-atsc-hevc-uhd-moca-2.0-tivo AMT] • [http://www.goamt.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/MG2_CABLE-MEDIA-GATEWAY-ATSC-HEVC-UHD-MOCA-2.0-TIVO_AMT.pdf Spec.] *[[TiVo MG3-R]] • ''Network CableCard Tuner'' *[[TiVo MG3-OTA-H]] • ''Network OTA Tuner'' *[[Arris Mi3]] (IP, WiFi) • [http://www.goamt.com/mi3-ip-client-optional-wifi-module AMT] • [http://www.goamt.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/MI3_IP-CLIENT-OPTIONAL-WIFI-MODULE_AMT.pdf Spec.] *[[Arris Mi4]] (IP900) • [http://www.goamt.com/mi4-cable-ip-client-atsc-hevc-uhd-moca-2.0-tivo AMT] • [http://www.goamt.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/MI4_CABLE-IP-CLIENT-ATSC-HEVC-UHD-WITH-MOCA-2.0-TIVO_AMT.pdf Spec.] *[[Arris Qi3]] (DCX860) • [http://www.goamt.com/qi3-cable-set-top-box-ip-client-atsc-avc-hd-moca-2.0-tivo AMT] • [http://www.goamt.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/QI3_CABLE-SET-TOP-BOX-IP-CLIENT-ATSC-AVC-HD-MOCA-2.0-TIVO_AMT.pdf Spec.]
